content:

Probably playing (base) guitar, which I can do for hours. (and still I suck at, I'm such a loser)-----------------

title: Re: What's your favorite thing to do for fun?
content: Let's see.. I've been bowling couple of times, not for a while though, that was fun.. Fishin' is sometimes quite fun. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-dopefish.gif[/img] Surfing the net, no.. Hangin' out.. no. Well, don't know really.[url=http://www.keengrid.net/]keengrid.net[/url] :: [url=http://www.keengrid.net/ckfiles/levels/xky1tuned.zip]xky1tuned.zip[/url]

title: hehe
content: Well, I've started getting back into Animal Crossing for the GameCube, and I occasionally still sacrifice entire evenings of my life to the slavedriver that is Diablo II: Lord of Destruction.  Other than that, I spend time working, hanging out with my girlfriend, and once in a while trying to get some work done on XkyKeen4... at the moment, I'm trying to figure out what to make of the Arachnut, Mimrock, and Wormouth.  :-(  Those are hard enemies to work with!

title: Re: hehe
content:
Well,

you're not going to believe this, but my favourate pastime is,

watching crystals grow; I can waste an entire hour just staring.A proud member of the signature stealing society

title: Re: hehe
content:
If they were colourful, shiny crystals, then that would be interesting.

I usually program in my spare time, or surf the net. Occasionally, I might go cycling or take the dog for a walk.

title: Re: hehe
content:
Math is always fun. I once played through several games of The Towers of Hanoi in my head so I could come up with an equation to find the minimum number of moves required for a given number of moves. I also like to play my bass, although my ego is a little bigger than Djaser's. But of the things in the poll, hanging out is good.________________
[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v462/lemur821/YorpEye.png[/img]

title: Everything!!!
content:
I like almost everything I can get my hands on. I love books; reading them, and sometimes writting them from time to time. I love mysteries. I also love reading about technology. I get PC World magazine, and while my brothers are in the toy isle, I'm examining the newest tech-toys [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-mischief.gif[/img] .

I will do almost anything fun (save anything I shouldn't do, or that is just wrong); running, swimming, model rocket building, riding huge roller coasters, you name it; I've done it (or at least really want to do it.

I love life!!! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img]

-- NAJAWA --

title: Re: Everything!!!
content:
Then you are truly living it.

title: Crystals:
content:
I could never have the patience to watch crystals.

-- NAJAWA --

title: Re: Crystals:
content:
Then you've never seen the 'acetate cascade' In this a supersturated solution of sodium acetate is tapped, shaken, or it just does it by itself, and in thirty seconds the entire soulution has turned to crystals that look like snow.

I've done something simalar with alum solution boiled on a stove for 10 miniutes, it takes about 5 miniutes to work, but you get to see tiny little diamonds form, grow bigger and sink to the bottom where they continue to feed off the liquid.A proud member of the signature stealing society

[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v410/Gannalev/Kazz.gif[/img]

"No one should be here."
-Levellord

title: Hmm...
content:

title: Re: Hmm...
content:

I like to go fishing
Nope. Although I do enjoy the smell of seafood.

I like to go bowling

I like to surf the web
Don't we all? [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-confused.gif[/img]

I like to hang out
We're all doing it now, right?

Other
It's got my vote.-- Censorship is F**ked! --

title: Re: Hmm...
content: Playing guitar till my fingers bleed...

title: New intrests:
content:
I'm the type of person who has favorite things in periods of obbsesion; Right now:

1) I love to compose music on the piano
2) LOTR Sondtracks
3) Writting stories
4) Money

Previous, yet slightly fading:
1) Game Making (This one fades in and out a lot)
2) Keen Modding (I lost my mods, and besides, it just needs a break)
3) Avatar Making!!! (I'll still do it, but I won't do it just for the heck of it)
4) Poverty

I love composing; it is a form of language which can express things which no words can even start to comprehend.

Happiness; the state of being joyful

Music Translation (e.g. Ode to Joy)

Andventure/Exitement

Music Translation (e.g. The Bridge of Kaza-dum [Track 13 Fellowship of the Ring soundtrack)

I love good music; and orchastrated soundtrack e.g.

-- NAJAWA --

title: Re: I don't know... what?
content:
I wasn't hinting at this, as it was only a joke (even if a bad one), but it's programming, taking photos of everything, and (this is similar to what I was hinting at) being with my girlfriend.
No football, absolutely no hunting as I find it absolutely disgusting, and cars are not something you do, unless you are one of the more fortunate. Game making is just one form of programming.
